name: BattleTails! - Android & iOS Strategic Defense Game
blurb: Battle Tails is a live action strategic defense game for Android and iOS that brings Huck Gee's Gold Life character designs to life!

rewards.reward: New entry level tier! Three 4" die-cut stickers showcasing 3 different heroes from the world of BattleTails! Vampy, Shirokuri and ???
Battle Tails Starter Pack - Get an overflowing chest of in-game gold and an exclusive early backer item pack from our tech tree to help accelerate your quest for world domination!

Battle Tails Insider - Battle Tails Starter Pack plus access to exclusive developer updates featuring developer videos, first looks at in-game shots, writing from the game, game art, and much more. We will be regularly updating "The Battle Tails Insider" with new info throughout development. Everyone at the $20 tier or higher will get access to this content.

Bronze Backer - Battle Tails Starter Pack, digital game soundtrack, and a bronze-level forum badge. Forum badges will be activated on the Battle Tails forum after the project is funded. (You will need a forum account to show off your badge.)
The Vampy Backer - includes the BattleTails Starter Pack and an exclusive Vampy print signed by Huck and Vampy.

Silver Backer - Battle Tails Starter Pack, digital game soundtrack, digital version of the "Making of Battle Tails" book, and a silver-level forum badge.  You'll also get access to exclusive artwork for smartphone and desktop backgrounds!

***Early Bird Reward***  Gold Backer - Battle Tails Starter Pack, digital game soundtrack, print version of the "Making of Battle Tails" book signed by Huck and the team, and a gold-level forum badge. (Please add $10 for shipping to territories outside the US and Canada).

Silver Backer + a Battle Tails T-Shirt!  We'll be producing some great Battle Tails Kickstarter t-shirts using artwork from Huck's Gold Life universe. Plus everything in the Silver Backer tier - Battle Tails Starter Pack, digital game soundtrack, digital version of the "Making of Battle Tails" book, and a silver-level forum badge. You'll also get access to exclusive artwork for smartphone and desktop backgrounds!

Silver Backer + a Battle Tails T-Shirt + an exclusive DJ Qbert in-game character to lead your battles! - Want to battle your friends with the best DJ on the planet?  We're designing an ultra bad ass version of DJ Qbert that will be the exclusive boss for 100 lucky Kickstarter backers.  When you battle with DJ Qbert everyone will know that you're a Kickstarter backer and helped make this project happen!

Silver Backer + a Battle Tails T-Shirt + DJ Qbert + Huck Gee in-game character to lead your battles! - Want to battle your friends with the Man himself?  We're designing an ultra bad ass version of Huck that will be the exclusive boss for 100 lucky Kickstarter backers.  When you battle with Huck, everyone will know that you're a Kickstarter backer and helped make this project happen!

Gold Backer - Battle Tails Starter Pack, digital game soundtrack, print version of the "Making of Battle Tails" book signed by Huck and the team, a gold-level forum badge, a Battle Tails T-Shirt, DJ Qbert and Huck Gee. (Please add $10 for shipping to territories outside the US and Canada).

8" Battle Tails Ten Thousand Winds Custom - Collect Huck's customs?  This pledge level is for you!  Huck plans to create ten limited production customs of one of the characters from the Ten Thousands Winds Clan.  Backers will have an opportunity to vote for their favorite character from the clan for the custom run.  (Note: that this is a separate reward and no items are included from other tiers.)

8" Battle Tails Clan Six Tails Custom - Collect Huck's customs?  This pledge level is for you!  Huck plans to create ten limited production customs of one of the characters from the Six Tails Clan.  Backers will have an opportunity to vote for their favorite character from the clan for the custom run.  (Note: that this is a separate reward and no items are included from other tiers. If you would like to add another reward tier please increase your pledge amount accordingly and shoot us over a message. Example: want to add Gold Backer to this? Pledge $1250 Thanks!)

8" Battle Tails Boso Ichiban Clan Custom - Collect Huck's customs?  This pledge level is for you!  Huck plans to create ten limited production customs of one of the characters from the Boso Ichiban Clan.  Backers will have an opportunity to vote for their favorite character from the clan for the custom run.  (Note: that this is a separate reward and no items are included from other tiers. If you would like to add another reward tier please increase your pledge amount accordingly and shoot us over a message. Example: want to add Gold Backer to this? Pledge $1250 Thanks!)
Set of all 3 8" Clan Customs - This is for all 3 of the Clan customs. (we will adjust available quantities of individual clan customs as this fills up to maintain the max 10 available)

20" Mega Battle Tails Ten Thousand Winds Custom - Own one of the most exclusive pieces of art available while supporting the game.  Huck has agreed to create a one of a kind 20" mega custom for each clan.  (Note: includes Gold Backer Tier)

20" Mega Battle Tails Clan Six Tails Custom - Own one of the most exclusive pieces of art available while supporting the game.  Huck has agreed to create a one of a kind 20" mega custom for each clan.  (Note: includes Gold Backer Tier)

20" Mega Battle Tails Boso Ichiban Clan Custom - Own one of the most exclusive pieces of art available while supporting the game.  Huck has agreed to create a one of a kind 20" mega custom for each clan.  (Note: includes Gold Backer Tier)
